html:
{% if doc.insurance_party and doc.insurance_party != "" %} {% endif %} {{doc.get_inner_item_children()}}
{{ doc.get_qrcode() }}
Cash Invoice
فاتورة نقدية
Invoice No. {{doc.name}}
Patient: {{ doc.patient }} File No: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Patient", doc.patient, "patient_number") }} Visit Date: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.creation).strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S",) }}
Payer Name Plan Patient Card No. Form No.
{{doc.insurance_party}} Class Default {{ doc.patient_card_no or "" }} {{ doc.form_no or ""}}
Service Description Price Charge
(Patient Share)
Currency : {{ doc.currency }} Total: {% if doc.coverage_percentage %} 0.00 {% else %} {{'%0.2f'| format(doc.total|float)}} {% endif %}
User : {{ frappe.get_fullname(doc.modified_by) }} Discounnt : {% if doc.coverage_percentage %} 0.00 {% else %}{{'%0.2f'| format(doc.total_discount_provider|float)}} {% endif %}
Printing Date : {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime().strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S",) }} Amount Paid : {{'%0.2f'| format(doc.grand_total - doc.outstanding_amount|float)}}
Printed By : {{ frappe.get_fullname(frappe.session.user) }} Balance : {{'%0.2f'| format(doc.outstanding_amount|float)}}
 
This Invoice is considered Valid if it Carries the Official Number and Stamp
تعتبر هذه الفاتورة رسمية إذا كانت تحمل رقما وختما في الخانة المخصصة
name: Sales Invoice
